#7a>.	Write a shell script that accepts filenames specified as 
#	arguments and creates a shell script that contains these
#	file as well as the code to recreate these files. Thus
#	if the script generated by you is generated by your script
#	is executed, it would recreate the original files. (This 
#	is same as the bundle script generated by the Brain. W.
#	Kernighan and Rob Pike in the UNIX programming environment,
#	Prentice-Hall, India).

if [ $# -eq 0 ]
then
	echo "Invalid arguments."
	exit
fi

for i in $*
do
	echo "echo Extracting $i file.">>bundle.sh
	echo "cat > $i <<'EOF'">>bundle.sh
	cat < $i >>bundle.sh
	echo "EOF">>bundle.sh	
done
